tls:text.tls:line: What the Han obtained is formal/ritual CONTROL OVER the feudal states. But the question is whether 得 itself may not have to be taken to mean "gain formal/ritual control of". Xu Jialu 2014 tr.: 因此漢得到天 下以來，常想治理得很好，
